main.bio: Hello! I am 20 years old, I graduated from Union High School in 2019 and am currently a Computer Science Major at UVA-Wise. The programming language I prefer is C++, but I am willing to be outside of my comfort zone.
main.contactmessage: The best way to get in contact of me is by the email provided!
